title: Statement from Dario Amodei on Our Discussions with the Department of War
author: qwertox
aiHeadline: Dario Amodei gives a heartfelt 'we're talking to the Department of War' update, because who doesn't want their AI safety discussions to sound like a war council?

title: Tell HN: YC companies scrape GitHub activity, send spam emails to users
author: miki123211
aiHeadline: YC startups are now scraping GitHub for activity and spamming users—because what better way to 'build something that matters' than to be the new spam kings of the internet?

title: Anthropic ditches its core safety promise
author: motbus3
aiHeadline: Anthropic throws its core safety promise out the window, proving once again that when it comes to AI, 'safety' is just a word until someone decides it's not worth the effort.

title: Nano Banana 2: Google's latest AI image generation model
author: davidbarker
aiHeadline: Google introduces Nano Banana 2, the latest AI image generation model—because clearly, the world needs another AI that can draw bananas, but this time, they're nano-sized!

title: Layoffs at Block
author: mlex
aiHeadline: Block lays off employees, proving that even in the age of AI and automation, the best way to 'cut costs' is still the old-fashioned method of laying off people—because innovation has its limits, apparently.
